data.persona: I am ruler over all I see.  I think my subjects admire me.  I love gold.
data.description:
You are in the Queen's quarters.
This room is luxurious. It is lined with the finest golds and silks. The colors are purple and pink and a variety of drapes cover the walls.
There's a drape here.
The architect is here.

You are carrying a crown and a cape.

data.short_motivation: I need to take off my crown and clothes to bare myself to the architect, my queen.
data.mid_motivation: I'm going to make love to my wife, the queen.
data.long_motivation: I want my wife to bear a strong, suitable heir.
